text: Marius Bratu (born 27 February 1973) is a Romanian former footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Rapid București, FCM Bacău or Astra Ploiești, among other teams. After retirement, he was the executive president of CSM Focșani, then the manager of the senior team.Echipa de fotbal a CSM Focșani 2007 are o nouă conducere tehnică!. csmfocsani2007.ro ==Honours== ;Rapid București *Supercupa României winner: 1999 ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Focșani Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CSM Focșani players Category:FC Progresul București players Category:FC Rapid București players Category:FCM Bacău players Category:FC Astra Giurgiu players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:FC Vaslui players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Elista players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Romanian football managers
title: Marius Bratu
